Notes: Solder so that the plastic tab is closer to the outer perimeter of the board.

Supplier Description: Stackable 0.100″ Female Header with Extra 0.3″ Spacer: 2x20-Pin, Straight
Notes: The female side should be on the underside of the board, while the male pins should stick up.

Supplier Description: 0.100" (2.54 mm) Breakaway Male Header: 1×40-Pin, Straight, Black
Notes: Break of appropriate length of header and insert long ends into the female headers.
Solder the UART/PDN jumper pads on the board first! Then place on the male headers (short ends), confirm correct orientation, and solder.
On the underside of the board. First solder the pads on the side, then solder the SMT pins.
